nodes.text: The Suprosa supercomputer was a computer programmed into the systems of the Imperial freighter Suprosa which contained technical data for the Death Star II. It was secured by Dash Rendar and a group of Bothans during the Raid on the Suprosa. It was guarded last defense by a loader droid reprogrammed to kill the intruders.
In its appearance in the Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire video game video game, it is designed to have the appearance of a Nintendo 64 from a distance.
